Description: Fragment of papyrus bearing one line of a Coptic text on recto and 10 lines written at right angles on verso. The papyrus shows the remains of folds. 75407-75411 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380677) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380677)
